original_text: Jesus put out his hand towards him and he touched him. ‘I do want to help you. Be clean again,’ Jesus said. Immediately, the man's skin was clean again.
korean_text: 예수께서 손을 내밀어 그에게 대시며 이르시되 내가 원하노니 깨끗함을 받으라 하시니 즉시 그의 나병이 깨끗하여진지라

sentences.original_text: Jesus put out his hand towards him
I do want to help you
Immediately, the man's skin was clean again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 즉시 그 사람의 피부가 다시 깨끗해졌다
